about.title: About
about.description:
I'm a full-stack JS developer, currently focused in React/React Native development and blockchain solutions.

I worked in multiple stacks (React, AngularJs, .Net, Java, Android...), environments and types of companies (Startup, medium size and big corporate).

I currently work remotely as a frontend developer and mainly working with Javascript, React/ReactNative, NodeJS and Blockchain.

experience.description: Working providing services for the development of their mobile app using ReactNative, with the goal of providing a complete, fast and smooth Cryptocurrency exchange application.
